msbt.message: So whaddaya think? I don't wear this snazzy getup for just any day, kiddo. But Bunny Day's special!Alright, alright! Show's over! Go find some eggs, .
Everyone says Zipper never, ever stops dancin'but I know better.Keep an eye on him long enough and you'll catch him huffin' and puffin', all out of breath, .Poor fella must be exhausted!
So spill it, . How many of them candy eggs have you eaten?Don't get me wrong. I ain't blamin' you. Just don't forget to save a few for makin' stuff, !

You seen those colorful balloons floatin' around? I swear even the skies have caught Bunny Day fever!They're carryin' things too! Gifts, I reckon. I've a mind to shoot some of those blimps down and find out.
I just saw the fancy-pants-iest bottle I've ever seen down on the beach. Painted up just like a Bunny Day egg!Can't imagine how long that must've been driftin',
How's your egg hunt going there, ? You fillin' up those pockets of yours?Y'know, if you don't mind gettin' dust in your pockets, you might could find a few eggs buried in the ground.
How's the egg findin'? Rumor is you can get 'em from rocks, especially on those Nook Miles Ticket tour islands.Eggs from rocks Sounds like some kinda joke, doesn't it? But maybe it's worth a try, !

Wanna hear somethin' strange? So I went out fishing earlier. I cast my line, waited a bit, and got a bite Must've wrestled with it for an hour! I finally hauled it up thinkin' that I'd caught The Big One andit's an egg!What in tarnation?! Firstly, I wanted a fish, not an egg! And secondly how did an EGG put up such a fight?Boggles the mind.
Enjoying Bunny Day, kiddo? 'Cause I gotta tell ya, all this egg-hunting nonsense iseggs-haustin'!
It amazes me how worked up folks get over Bunny Day. What's so great about a bunch of candy eggs?
Hey there, kiddo. Bunny Day going well for you? Finding lots of eggs? 'Cause I was wonderin'How'd you feel about doin' an egg exchange? Let's say3 of yours for 3 of my ?
Sure!
No, thanks.

Judging by that grin of yours, I'd say your egg hunt is goin' swell. Think you could help out? I'm feeling kinda stuck. I'm findin' plenty of eggs, but they're nearly all of the same type.Any chance I could convince you to trade away 3 of your eggs for 3 of my ?
Sure!
No, thanks.
Ha! I knew you wouldn't let me down! Alrighty, which eggs will it be, ?
That might be the best news I've heard all day! Which eggs do you wanna off-load, ?
I owe you one. It was getting real frustratin' finding so many of the same kind of egg. Take care, now!
My, these eggs sure are a sight Thanks for helping me out.
Ahh Thought that might've been pushin' it. Sorry about that.
Oh That's a shame. Well, ain't like these are gonna rot, so let me know if you change your mind.
Just to be sure, you're offerin' 3 of your for 3 of my ?
That's right.
I've changed my mind.
That's music to my ears, kiddo. Let's get to it!
I like your enthusiasm, but it seems your pockets are all full up. You'll have to do somethin' about that first.
